= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= land and ethnic group ◄ located in Syria; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= reference to the northern kingdom of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) of which Ephraim was the most important tribe
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit
= a large group of trees or shrubs which grow close together and where several wild animals are known to live; ≈ considered to be a dangerous place for humans and domestic animals

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call

= man; ◄ son of Amoz (אָמֹוץ) ► prophet (נָבִיא)

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart

= action by which humans purposefully move in the direction of (another) human, deity, or object to engage with them

= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= relatively large reservoir ◄ dug by human hands ► to collect water; place where many public activities take place
= state of being in an elevated position
= a relatively wide road or access ramp made by by covering the surface of the ground with thicks layers of sand

= a piece of land outside of inhabited areas, which is the property of individuals, generally used for cultivating food trees, grain, and vegetables; can be bought and sold; property which can be transferred from one person to another
participle as noun: = name of a location near Jerusalem

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call

Node.gloss: to be careful|to make sure|to take precautions
Node.definition: = action by which humans ensure their own well being by being watchful, by making sure that certain instructions are carried out, or by refraining from certain activities

Node.gloss: to be confident|to be at ease|to be calm
Node.definition: = state in which humans feel confident and calm ◄ either because living under favorable circumstances or because of lack of fear when living under difficult circumstances

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere

= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= the remaining part of a piece of firewood that has not yet been affected by the fire
= piece of wood; ► used for making fire
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= state in which someone experiences extreme displeasure
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
literally: to cry out (someone's) name (something); hence: = action by which humans assign a name to a person or place
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

= man; ◄ possibly son of Ahaz (אָחָז) or Isaiah (יְשַׁעְיָהוּ); ► whose birth was foretold by the prophet (נָבִיא) Isaiah (יְשַׁעְיָהוּ) as a sign to Ahaz (אָחָז) often taken as a reference of the Messiah (מָשִׁיחַ)

= coagulated substance; ◄ formed by action of acids on milk; ► made into cheese (חָרִיץ) or eaten as food; ≈ regarded as choice food and therefore often associated with prosperity; because of the smoothness of this substance it is sometimes associated with flattery and untrustworthiness as well
= sweet substance ◄ made either by bees, or from fruits such as dates, grapes or figs; ► much appreciated as food; ≈ associated with abundance and fertility
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

Node.gloss: to know how|to be skilful at
Node.definition: literally: to know; hence: = state in which humans have the experience, skill, and expertise to carry out a particular activity
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= a marker pointing to the time preceding a particular point in time

= action by which humans or deities move away from an object, person, or place

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= reference to the northern kingdom of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) of which Ephraim was the most important tribe

= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= a body of water flowing to and from the Nile river, whether in the form of a manmade canal or a subsidiary river branch, especially those of the Nile delta region
= nation and their territory; ◄ regarded as founded by one of the sons of Ham (חָם) with the same name

= flying insect that collects nectar from flowers and converts it into honey; lives in swarms made up of many thousands of insects; sting only when threatened; ≈ with connotations ranging from positive (food producing) to negative (as metaphor for an army of well organized enemies
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= nation; ◄ located in Northern Mesopotamia with Nineveh (נִינְוֵה) as its capital; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
meaning unsure; possibly: = an area between mountains or rocks surrounded by slopes that rise sharply, which is difficult to find and provides a hiding place for people that do not want to be found
= a narrow opening or long, narrow crack in a rock; ≈ regarded as a suitable place for hiding
= some kind of thorny plant; ► associated with neglect and regarded as painful nuisance
exact meaning unknown; possibly: = place near a body of water, where people and animals can drink

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= sharp knife ► used to shave hair from the skin; also used to sharpen one's pen
= state in which animals or objects have been made available to be of service or use to others for a limited amount of time and in return for payment
= large body of flowing water ◄ located in Mesopotamia
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= the fine thread like strands growing from the skin of humans and certain animals
literally: feet; hence: = a euphemism for a man's genitals

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

Node.gloss: to keep alive|to restore to life
Node.definition: = to cause an object to become or remain alive and well; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in most cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= female young of a cow (פָּרָה) ► used as sacrifice

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= state in which a countable entity is two in number

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

Node.gloss: to bear|to yield|to produce|to bring forth
Node.definition: literally: to make; hence: = natural process by which land, plants, or animals develop vegetation, branches, fruits, produce milk, etc.

= white fluid; ◄ secreted by women and female mammals; ► for nourishment of their children or young; also used as food for humans; ≈ highly appreciated and considered high quality food; associated with delight, whiteness, purity, wealth, and well being; metaphor for beauty, young age; quality, wealth, and sex
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

= coagulated substance; ◄ formed by action of acids on milk; ► made into cheese (חָרִיץ) or eaten as food; ≈ regarded as choice food and therefore often associated with prosperity; because of the smoothness of this substance it is sometimes associated with flattery and untrustworthiness as well

= coagulated substance; ◄ formed by action of acids on milk; ► made into cheese (חָרִיץ) or eaten as food; ≈ regarded as choice food and therefore often associated with prosperity; because of the smoothness of this substance it is sometimes associated with flattery and untrustworthiness as well
= sweet substance ◄ made either by bees, or from fruits such as dates, grapes or figs; ► much appreciated as food; ≈ associated with abundance and fertility
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= state in which humans, animals, plants, or objects remain in existence after part of the original quantity has disappeared or has been used or dealt with in a certain way

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= a creeping plant that develops a woody stem when it matures; it grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils (שָׂרִיג) ◄ vitis vinifera; ► it bears clusters (אֶשְׁכֹּל) of grapes (עֲנָב) that are sweet and juicy and can be made into wine (יַיִן) ≈ a symbol of blessing, prosperity, and happiness
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= small shrub with thorns; ≈ associated with things of no value, aggression, and destruction
= small shrub with thorns; ≈ associated with things of no value, aggression, and destruction

= pointed missile, shot from a bow; slender and straight in shape and moving swiftly; ◄ made out of wood and/or iron; ► mainly used for hunting, in warfare, and occasionally for divination; ≈ symbol of aggression, affliction, and punishment
= a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war
= small shrub with thorns; ≈ associated with things of no value, aggression, and destruction
= small shrub with thorns; ≈ associated with things of no value, aggression, and destruction

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= flat metal blade, 10 20 centimeters wide, mounted on a wooden handle with the blade at a right angle to the handle; ► used for loosening the soil and weeding
= state in which humans experience fear
= small shrub with thorns; ≈ associated with things of no value, aggression, and destruction

= male or female herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns
